short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switches tabs at user-configurable intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Tab Switcher is your solution for effortless tab management, especially when juggling multiple tabs containing important data or portfolios. This extension automatically cycles between your open tabs at specified intervals, ensuring that each tab gets its time in the spotlight. With customizable settings for switching interval and duration, you can tailor the experience to suit your needs. Whether you're monitoring financial data, project updates, or news feeds, Auto Tab Switcher helps you stay organized and informed without constant manual intervention.

Key Features:

- Automatically rotates between open tabs at defined intervals.
- Customizable settings for switching interval and duration.
- Seamlessly manage multiple tabs containing important data or portfolios.
- Enhances organization and productivity during multitasking.

Example:
Imagine you have multiple tabs open in your browser, each displaying different financial portfolios or critical data sets. Instead of manually switching between tabs to keep track of each portfolio, you can use Auto Tab Switcher. Simply set the switching interval to your desired frequency, such as every 30 seconds, and the extension will automatically cycle through the tabs. This way, you can keep an eye on all your portfolios without constantly switching tabs, allowing you to focus on analyzing the data and making informed decisions.
